      • update

        public java.util.List<test.Box> update(java.util.List<test.Box> tiles,
                                       java.util.Vector<MainCharacter> fullCharacters)
        This function updates character's and bullets' positions. Deletes bullets if there is collision, changes XPs of enemies
        Parameters:
        tiles - Simple obstacles
        fullCharacters - all avatars of players on-line
        Returns:
        returns main character and bullets in a Box class form. Box class contains only information necessary to render objects on the client side
